theJungle:PetSnecko.NAME: Pet Snecko
theJungle:PetSnecko.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Randomize the cost of all cards in your hand this turn.
theJungle:PetSnecko.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Randomize the cost of all cards in your hand this turn.

theJungle:SS_Clouding.NAME: Clouding Spores
theJungle:SS_Clouding.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Draw 1 card. NL Gain !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

theJungle:SS_Bright.NAME: Bright Spores
theJungle:SS_Bright.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Draw 1 card. NL Add !M! Dazed into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

theJungle:SS_Clumping.NAME: Clumping Spores
theJungle:SS_Clumping.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

theJungle:SS_Leeching.NAME: Leeching Spores
theJungle:SS_Leeching.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Draw 1 card. NL ALL enemies heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

theJungle:SS_Toxin.NAME: Toxin Spores
theJungle:SS_Toxin.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Draw 1 card. NL Take !M! damage. NL Exhaust.

theJungle:SS_Sloth.NAME: Sloth Spores
theJungle:SS_Sloth.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Draw 1 card. NL Gain !M! Slothful. NL Exhaust.
